constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 162 (Monday, September 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NEGUSE:
H.R. 5299.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H4556]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances for family members to attend the funeral and memorial services of members of the uniformed services.
